channel.title: Changing points given when completing slayer task [pi]
channel.description:
Just wondering in what file would i change points that are given for completing a slayer task, as atm mine gives double for some tasks.
thanks

item.title: Changing points given when completing slayer task [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

well if its only for some tasks, usually those are the harder tasks, lets say. killing Rock crabs gives 10 points. Then killing Green dragons, since they are in the wild and you could die thats where i could see certain things give double points.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing points given when completing slayer task [pi]
